Season 1 focused on the life of a comic. Season 2 delves into Jewish american lifestyles. Season 3 is about show business and how back stabbing it is with focus on family dynamics and turmoil.

These One-star reviewers seem to think this is a documentary of the 60s. ITS A COMEDY-DRAMA SERIES not a Ken Burn's special. A lot of bozo reviewers on here think they are Roger Ebert or Gene Siskel or something. OMG. its a great show. Review Title: Great Show Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

I like the main actors. I would like to see them in a better movie. Kinda funny but lost interest less than half way through.... {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['J Blakeson'], 'Producers': ['Tobey Maguire'], 'Starring': ['Chloë Grace Moretz', 'Nick Robinson', 'Ron Livingston'], 'Studio': ['Columbia Pictures']} Just terrible....and cheesy. Abrams'], 'Producers': ['Kathleen Kennedy', 'J.J. Abrams', 'Bryan Burk'], 'Starring': ['Harrison Ford', 'Mark Hamill', 'Carrie Fisher'], 'Studio': ['Lucasfilm']} Great. I want the force so I can fetch drinks and food while I rewatch. Awesome nice franchise for episode 7. {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Richard Schenkman'], 'Producers': ['Richard Schenkman', 'Eric D. Wilkinso'], 'Starring': ['David Lee Smith', 'Sterling Knight', 'Michael Dorn'], 'Studio': ['WowNow Entertainment']} This was a VERY disappointing sequel to the original which was an awesome plot/story that was riveting.

Don't ruin your memory from the original and pretend this turd doesn't exist. I agree with most of everybody else Shazam! Fantasy, Comedy, Exciting, Sweet ['Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Sandberg'], 'Producers': ['Peter Safran'], 'Starring': ['Zachary Levi', 'Asher Angel', 'Mark Strong']} I'm not going to write a long explanation.

It's a good story, likable characters, lots of humor with a splash of seriousness and a decent bad guy. profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user continues to favor comedy intertwined with fantasy, while their recent evaluation reinforces a growing appreciation for original narratives and quality storytelling that enhances cohesiveness in adaptations.

- **Engagement Level:** The user’s interest in complete series remains strong, demonstrated by their recent enjoyment of a show that offers a concise episode format conducive to quick engagement, indicating a preference for narratives that can be consumed rapidly.

- **Actor Appreciation:** The admiration for talented actors endures, but their recent feedback reveals an increased sensitivity to casting changes. Consistency in casting has become a significant factor in their investment in any series.

- **Review Disposition:** The user exhibits a discerning perspective, as evidenced by their positive review which highlights the importance of acting quality and originality. They express a readiness to disengage from a series if cast changes occur, reinforcing their expectation for stability in adaptations.

- **Tolerance for Content:** Their standards are evolving, favoring narratives rich in depth and originality. This marks a shift from previous leniency to a more critical stance, particularly toward content that showcases strong performances.

- **Overall Trend:** The user is focused on engaging narratives that maintain continuity in both casting and plot quality. Their latest critique underscores their commitment to narrative integrity while balancing an appreciation for acting talent and original storytelling, showcasing a nuanced view of evolving content standards.
